description:
Don’t let the wind push you around and glide right through with these Nordic training pants. The wind-proof panels at the front keep you protected, while the stretchy softshell fabric in the rear allows sweat to escape. Add in the adjustability and stretchiness, and you’ve got some seriously comfy snow pants.

  • 3-layer softshell fabric with windproof panels at the front stop wind in its tracks while letting you move how you want. Added softshell fabric in the seat area keeps your tush warm when you need to take a rest
  • Pre-shaped knees and stretchy jersey fabric behind them give you effortless movement
  • Adjustable elastic waistband and zippers with elastic at the legs make for an easy on and controlled fit for every glide
  • Zippered pocket at the back stores your essentials
  • The regular fit keep comfort is at the forefront of your adventures
name: Craft Core Nordic Training Pants - Men's
